div.p:
I am a Systems Engineer at the Canada Space Agency.

I constantly work with teams located across Canada.

We've been using GCDOCS as a collaboration tool to help us work at a distance

and collaborate on our projects and coordinate workflow.

For example, right now I'm working on a project that requires our teams to constantly create,

review and revise planning documents and spreadsheets.

GCDOCS makes it much easier for us to coordinate these activities and instantly share our project files.

Before GCDOCS, it wasn't always easy to locate and retrieve our files using the shared drives.

GCDOCS allows us to save files in a common location—the Enterprise Workspace.

Now, I always know exactly where to find any project document when I need it.

This saves all of our team members a lot of time.

Just as important, GCDOCS makes it easy to keep our files 'evergreen'

so we're always sure that we're working with the most recent project files.
